rules_text:
Lands you control are each basic land type in addition to their other types.
When Chromatic Attunement enters, acquire two land cards. [i](Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal two land cards. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)[/i]
notes:

+Freecast ability
